attributes.action: organise a legal riot outside the bank of England in reference to bank charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the legal system in this country seems to, a lot of people, to be failing to protect the populance and instead seems focused on protecting a weathly minority - lets forget about the legal system and rely on 'mob rule' after all isn't this essentially what democracy is. I suggest we have our first riot in honour of the bankers

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
